docs.snippet: Islamist parties long opposed to drinking have taken a new line: that alcohol should be banned for health reasons, rather than religious ones....
docs.lead_paragraph: Islamist parties long opposed to drinking have taken a new line: that alcohol should be banned for health reasons, rather than religious ones.
docs.abstract: Some Indonesians are worried that latest efforts by Islamic political parties to pass ban on alcohol in Parliament could be successful, as their argument for ban is that it promotes health; previous efforts were advanced based on religious arguments, and so far dominant secular parties have done little to quash legislation, which could have significant impact on tourism in country.

headline.main: Indonesia Is Pushed to Ban Alcohol for Health of Bodies, if Not Souls
headline.print_headline: Alcohol Ban Is Promoted in Indonesia

HUNGARY RELAXES CURBS; Modifies Travel Restrictions on Foreign Diplomats

docs.snippet: One certainly sympathizes with the problem of passport procrastinator mentioned by Frances G. Knight, director of the Passport Office, in her letter (Travel section, Dec. 6). But surely the real solution -- short of an international agreement obvi...
docs.lead_paragraph: One certainly sympathizes with the problem of passport procrastinator mentioned by Frances G. Knight, director of the Passport Office, in her letter (Travel section, Dec. 6). But surely the real solution -- short of an international agreement obviating the necessity of passports altogether -- lies in simplifying the immense bureaucracy that underlies the issuance of passports.
docs.abstract: P M Rosenberg lr calls for simplification of US passport procedures

docs.snippet: The campaign was prompted in part by the recent bombing of a Russian airliner in Egypt and the downing of a Russian warplane by Turkey....
docs.lead_paragraph: The campaign was prompted in part by the recent bombing of a Russian airliner in Egypt and the downing of a Russian warplane by Turkey.
docs.abstract: Israeli tourism officials begin campaign to entice Russian tourists by promoting Israel as alternative to Turkey and Egypt; marketing scheme was spurred by Russia’s suspension of flights to and from Egypt and its imposition of sanctions on Turkey.

headline.main: Israel: Campaign Aims to Attract Russian Tourists
